main.description: Fetch external PDF through proxy to avoid CORS issues. Returns PDF binary data. Only allows fetching from trusted academic sources.

source.description: External source identifier (e.g., arxiv, biorxiv, medrxiv)

output.description: PDF binary data with Content-Disposition header for download

errors.name: AuthenticationRequired
errors.description: Authentication is required to fetch PDFs

errors.name: EprintNotFound
errors.description: The specified eprint does not exist in the external source

errors.name: PdfNotAvailable
errors.description: No PDF is available for this eprint

errors.name: DomainNotAllowed
errors.description: PDF URL is not from an allowed academic domain

errors.name: FetchFailed
errors.description: Failed to fetch PDF from external source
